item.description:
Summer fruits are ripening! Now is the time to learn how to preserve the bounty for enjoyment through the rest of the year.

In this hands on workshop you'll learn how to process cultivated or wild grapes to create delicious jam. It will include discussion about jelly and juice making. You'll also learn about the equipment and processes for basic water bath canning. This method can be used for other fruits, jams and some vegetable preserves.

The loose agenda:
11 AM- Meet and greet
11:15 Start processing the grapes with ongoing discussion of equipment and techniques
1:30ish- Share a snack while the jars of jam cool
2:00- Wrap up

Please bring:
A snack to share with the group
Pen and paper for notes

Suggested donation of $5 to help cover meetup costs.
item.how_to_find_us: Park on Topsfield Rd. and come to the front door.
item.name: Grape Jam Festa
